title: New: Rude – Heartbreaker
body:
This vibrant new jam from UK producer/songwriter **Rude** reminds me early 00’s American pop, back when Rob Thomas was releasing hit after hit (I’m not quite sure where this connection is coming from).

In all honesty, Heartbreaker is perhaps more JT and N\*SYNC than [This Is How A Heart Breaks](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YlIwHFGCrNY), yet definitely worth of a listen. Check it out below.
